Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT obj.name AS FK_NAME, sch.name AS [schema_name], tab1.name AS [table], col1.name AS [column], tab2.name AS [referenced_table], col2.name AS [referenced_column] FROM sys.foreign_key_columns fkc INNER JOIN sys.objects obj ON obj.object_id = fkc.constraint_object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab1 ON tab1.object_id = fkc.parent_object_id INNER JOIN sys.schemas sch ON tab1.schema_id = sch.schema_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col1 ON col1.column_id = parent_column_id AND col1.object_id = tab1.object_id INNER JOIN sys.tables tab2 ON tab2.object_id = fkc.referenced_object_id INNER JOIN sys.columns col2 ON col2.column_id = referenced_column_id AND col2.object_id = tab2.object_id

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select schema_name(tab.schema_id) as schema_name, tab.name as table_name, col.column_id, col.name as column_name, t.name as data_type, col.max_length, col.precision, col.is_nullable, sep.value [Description] from sys.tables as tab inner join sys.columns as col on tab.object_id = col.object_id left join sys.types as t on col.user_type_id = t.user_type_id left join sys.extended_properties sep on tab.object_id = sep.major_id AND col.column_id = sep.minor_id

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select schema_name(tab.schema_id) as schema_name, tab.name as table_name, col.column_id, col.name as column_name, t.name as data_type, col.max_length, col.precision, col.is_nullable, sep.value [Description] from sys.views as tab inner join sys.columns as col on tab.object_id = col.object_id left join sys.types as t on col.user_type_id = t.user_type_id left join sys.extended_properties sep on tab.object_id = sep.major_id AND col.column_id = sep.minor_id

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE a SET a.EditDate = getdate() FROM gr_user.[Users] a JOIN inserted i ON i.[UserId] = a.[UserId] END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER gr_user.After_U_Users_trg ON gr_user.[Users] AFTER UPDATE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE a SET a.EditDate = getdate() FROM [repository].Accounts a JOIN inserted i ON i.AccountId = a.AccountId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [repository].[After_U_Account_trg] ON [repository].Accounts AFTER UPDATE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE a SET a.EditDate = getdate() FROM [repository].[CountryRegion] a JOIN inserted i ON i.[CountryId] = a.[CountryId] END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER repository.After_U_CountryRegion_trg ON [repository].[CountryRegion] AFTER UPDATE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE a SET a.EditDate = getdate() FROM [repository].Servers a JOIN inserted i ON i.ServerId = a.ServerId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [repository].[After_U_Server_trg] ON [repository].Servers AFTER UPDATE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
UPDATE a SET a.EditDate = getdate() FROM [repository].Systems a JOIN inserted i ON i.SystemId = a.SystemId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [repository].[After_U_System_trg] ON [repository].Systems AFTER UPDATE AS
